task.summary: Default task
Improved the code, zooming is implemented but buggy
Added a quality setting
Got some basic UI prototype working
Zooming is working (almost!) correctly
Fixed the (presumably) last problem in zooming... that was an easy one :)
Added two new gradients and a new julia fractal: z^3 + c
Implemented supersampling and improved input processing
Added two new julia fractals: exp(z^3)-c and exp(z^2)-c
Updated to the latest stable version of libGDX (0.9.9)
Small GUI improvements.
Added a "busy" icon to the GUI.
Improved GUI skins, mostly the large one. Plus the "aneurism" gradient :)
Improved the fractal rendering logic.
Improved the time it takes to return to the android activity once it's been started
Improved the sliding window.
Improved the color selection GUI.
Added LOADS of new gradients and improved the scrolling of the gradient selector.
Improved many GUI aspects.
Fixed a (likely) memleak involving a texture in FractalRenderer
Countless GUI improvements.
Supposedly, last commit before going "official".
Had to hardcode all the gradient filenames -.-
Fixed window border size.
Updated AndroidManifest.
Added missing gradients.
Small GUI improvements.
Added a nice welcome window and fixed a memory leak :)

Added two new gradients and a new julia fractal: z^3 + c
Implemented supersampling and improved input processing

Fixed a (likely) memleak involving a texture in FractalRenderer

Added a nice welcome window and fixed a memory leak :)

option.value: Added a nice welcome window and fixed a memory leak :)
